data.comment: The big names in today's match at Dignity Health Sports Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 1, LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 6, Cristian Pavon gets his shot on target but fails to score for LA Galaxy.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 8, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 11, Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Vancouver have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Important block from the LA Galaxy defence as Lucas Cavallini fires in a strike for Vancouver.
In the minute 15, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Vancouver are pushing forward but Ali Adnan's finish is wide of the goal.
Victor Rivas awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick Vancouver.
Ali Adnan for Vancouver drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 20, Victor Rivas waits before resuming play because Perry Kitchen for LA Galaxy is still down.
Perry Kitchen is back on his feet again.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 23, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Daniel Steres (LA Galaxy) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Cristian Pavon of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
In the minute 30, Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Vancouver's area.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Cavallini.
Vancouver's Lucas Cavallini looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 38, LA Galaxy are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Carson, LA Galaxy push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Yony Gonzalez for LA Galaxy gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Vancouver at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Victor Rivas signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Vancouver will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from LA Galaxy.
In the minute 44, LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
Vancouver drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of LA Galaxy.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Perry Kitchen (LA Galaxy) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, Victor Rivas has blown to start the second-half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Carson.
In the minute 49, In Carson, Sacha Kljestan of LA Galaxy is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon misses with an attempt on goal.
Victor Rivas awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Vancouver at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Chicharito is on a sub for Yony Gonzalez for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 52, Sacha Kljestan (LA Galaxy) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Vancouver are caught offside.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 54, LA Galaxy are coming forward and Sebastian Lletget gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 56, In Carson Vancouver drive forward through Cristian Dajome. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vancouver pushes forward through Jake Nerwinski, whose finish on goal is saved.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Vancouver in Carson.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 70, LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Vancouver's area.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
The away team replace Michael Baldisimo with Ryan Raposo.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Vancouver.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 78, LA Galaxy are pushing forward but Chicharito's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
The home team have replaced Efrain Alvarez with Carlos Harvey. This is the second substitution made today by Guillermo Schelotto.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 80, Cristian Gutierrez is replacing Ali Adnan for the away team.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a Vancouver throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 84, LA Galaxy's Chicharito breaks free at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a third substitution, with Kai Koreniuk replacing Sebastian Lletget.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 89, Russell Teibert is booked for the away team.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Vancouver.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Victor Rivas blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
LA Galaxy take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kai Koreniuk.
That's a fine assist from Cristian Pavon.
Carlos Harvey for LA Galaxy has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
Vancouver make their third substitution with Theo Bair replacing Jake Nerwinski.
